author: lyazj
body:
#### PR description:

This PR aims to streamline the tagger inputs within the NanoAOD plugins, unifying them to accommodate multiple taggers (DeepJet, RobustParT, and UParT).

Key Changes:

* The previous DeepJetTableProducer, specifically designed for DeepJet, is replaced by a more versatile one: JetTaggerTableProducer. The core framework of the original producer remains intact, while additional branches are introduced to the NanoAOD output to support the UParT tagger.

* The default numbers of physics objects are adjusted to reduce the output file size. This adjustment is specific to the BTV group and will not affect other broader users.

* The support of two new optional environmental variables, CMSSW_NANOAOD_SV_SORT and CMSSW_NANOAOD_PF_SORT, is added to facilitate customized sorting strategies for secondary vertices and particle flow candidates.

This PR does not rely on any other pull requests or external resources.

#### PR validation:

The changes are tested using private scripts as well as following the guidelines in the "Before Making Your Pull Request" section at [the webpage](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Reduce and unify tagger inputs
